Check condition, functions below this one executes only if condition is TRUE. This is block function, block ends at ConditionEnd function.

Check if value of expression changed from previous check, functions below this one executes only if value was changed. This is block function, block ends at ConditionEnd function.
Close Condition block.
Execute ExecLink (any named hotkey).
Jump to function in script.
Check if variable exist, functions below this one executes only if variable exist. This is block function, block ends at ConditionEnd function.
Check if button is pushed, functions below this one executes only if button is pushed. This is block function, block ends at ConditionEnd function.
Set variable at index.
Wait some time in milliseconds.

Cuts the input directly to Output without changing Preview

Set Master Fader T-Bar, 255 will cut to Preview
Change Transition Duration for Button X
Change Transition for Button X
Clicks one of the four Transition buttons in the main vMix window.
Clicks one of the four Transition buttons in the main vMix window.
Toggles Fullscreen On or Off
Toggles Fullscreen Off
Toggles Fullscreen On
Change what is displayed on Output X.
Change what is displayed on the External2 output.
Change what is displayed on the Fullscreen output.
Change what is displayed on the Fullscreen output.
Create a snapshot image of the current Output. Optional Value specifies save Filename, otherwise a save file window will appear. Filename can specify date, for example mysnapshot {0:dd MMM yyyy}.jpg
Create a snapshot image of the selected Input. Optional Value specifies save Filename, otherwise a save file window will appear. Filename can specify date, for example mysnapshot {0:dd MMM yyyy}.jpg
Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.
Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.
Optional stream number starting from 0. Leave blank to control all streams.
Set Key on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,mystreamkey
Set Password on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,password
Set URL on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,rtmp://myurl/
Set Username on Custom RTMP Stream. Optional stream number starting from 0 at start followed by comma, e.g 0,username
Write current recording duration to log file with optional tag text Value.
Seconds to add or subtract from current Countdown time
Change countdown time according to Value as hh:mm:ss (00:00:00)
Pause or Resume Countdown or if complete, Start from beginning.
Freeze Title Input while making multiple updates
Resume Title Input rendering after making multiple updates
Set countdown duration according to Value as hh:mm:ss (00:00:00)
Change Image in Title according to Filename or empty to clear.
Toggle X Visibility in Title.
Hide X in Title.
Show X in Title. SelectedIndex or SelectedValue can be used to select image.
Change Text in Title according to Value parameter.
Change Colour of Text in Title in HTML format (#xxxxxx)
Change Ticker Speed.
Stop and Reset Countdown
Pause Countdown Only
Send to Output the selected Input
Create a new Input based on information provided in Value.

Turn On automatically playing first item in a List with Transition

Basic Auto Colour Correction.

Shows large preview of input
Toggles large preview of input

Export List as M3U to Filename
Remove from List by Index starting from 1
Remove all items from List
Shuffle (randomize) List
Move to next item in List

Send to Preview the selected Input

Move to previous item in List

Restart selected Input
Save video clip from Video Delay according to Duration in milliseconds
Change to Category according to Value
Photos,List: Selects item in List according to Value starting from number 1 Virtual Set: Zooms to selected preset using the current speed settings
Set Input transparency according to Value. 0 is transparent, 255 is opaque
Change Gain R level of Input. 1 = Original, Value = Value 0-2
Change Gain G level of Input. 1 = Original, Value = Value 0-2
Change Gain B level of Input. 1 = Original, Value = Value 0-2
Change Gain RGB level of Input. 1 = Original, Value = Value 0-2
Change Gamma R level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Gamma G level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Gamma B level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Gamma RGB level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Hue level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Lift R level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Lift G level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Lift B level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Lift RGB level of Input. 0=Original, Value = Value -1-1
Change Saturation level of Input. 0=Original, -1=Greyscale, Value = Value -1-1
Set the Display Name of the Input
Change current PanX value of Input. 0=centered, -2=100% to left, 2=100% to right, Value = Value -2-2
Change current PanY value of Input. 0=centered, -2=100% to bottom, 2=100% to top, Value = Value -2-2
Set transition effect for Photos and PowerPoint Inputs (Fade, Zoom, etc)
Set duration of transition effect in Milliseconds
Set transition time between Photos and PowerPoint slides in Seconds
Set Position of selected Input according to Value in Milliseconds
Set Playback speed/rate for Videos and Video Delays, 0.5=50%,1=100%,2=200% etc, Value = Speed 0.1-4
Set Slow Motion speed for Instant Replay, 0.5=50%,1=100% etc, Value = Speed 0-1
Change current Zoom level of Input. 1=100%, 0.5=50%, 2=200%, Value = Value 0-5
Start Video Delay Recording
Toggle Video Delay Recording
Stop Video Delay Recording
Wait for a Video Input to reach the end of playback.
